description.en:
Who knew that the life of an aristocrat would be full of such loneliness? Ruri wakes up one day as Albertina von Rozenburg, the oldest legitimate child of the Rozenburg family. This new life of hers is full of tetchy servants, unfamiliar rules, and distant family members. Ruri longs to go back to her familiar world, but there's no one here to guide her. With no one to trust, Ruri becomes wary of everyone, even the only person who seems to care about Albertina: Elma, a young servant girl who follows Albertina with a dogged devotion. When Ruri finds out that Albertina's only purpose is to get married off to an unpleasant, albeit very handsome, prince, she's had enough. She's going to find a way out of here, and if that means she doesn't act according to the traditions of this world, so be it.

---
Through her dream, she has been led to another world. Lee Ruli, the person who has possessed the body of the kingdom's Tineke (a kind of white rose). She leaves the mansion in order to find a clue on how to her world. However, Elma, the girl who follows the Tineke, is often at the back of her mind. In a strange world with no one to trust… Will Ruli be able to go on a safe journey and get back home?

---
* [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)
description.id:
Pemeran utamanya adalah Iruri. Dia dipindahkan ke dunia lain melalui mimpi dan memiliki tubuh Tineke. Itu adalah bangsawan muda dari kerajaan. Dia mencoba meninggalkan mansion untuk mendapatkan petunjuk untuk kembali ke dunia nyata. Namun, di dunia yang aneh di mana Elma, gadis yang mengikuti Tineke, selalu berada dalam pikirannya, dan ia tidak memiliki siapa pun untuk dipercaya. Akankah Ruri dapat menyelesaikan perjalanannya dan pulang dengan selamat?

---
* [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)
description.ko:
꿈을 통해 다른 세계로 이끌려 와
어느 왕국 귀족 영애, 티네케의 몸에 빙의하게 된 주인공, 이루리.
현실 세계로 돌아가기 위한 단서를 얻고자 저택에서 떠나려 한다.

하지만 티네케를 따르던 소녀, 엘마가 자꾸 눈에 밟히고
믿을 사람 하나 없는 낯선 세계에서 루리는 무력하기만 한데…

루리는 여정을 무사히 마치고 다시 집으로 돌아갈 수 있을까?

---
* [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)
description.zh:
主人公李露丽通过梦境穿越到了异世界，穿成了某个王国的贵族小姐阿尔贝蒂娜。她试图离开豪宅去寻找返回原世界的线索，然而在这个陌生的世界里，不断有人找自己的麻烦，没人可以信得过，李露丽很无奈......她还能安全地完成旅途并回家吗？

---
* [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)
description.zh-hk:
主人公李露麗通過夢境穿越到了異世界，穿成了某個王國的貴族小姐阿爾貝蒂娜。

她試圖離開豪宅去尋找返回原世界的線索，然而在這個陌生的世界裡，不斷有人找自己的麻煩，沒人可以信得過，李露麗很無奈......她還能安全地完成旅途並回家嗎？

---
* [Original Webtoon <Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/elegy)
